name: Tempest (itch)
description:
Tempest - A survival game

You've been shipwrecked and washed ashore on a mysterious deserted island.

You have a small flask of water and no food. How long can you survive?

Can you tame the island and make it your home?

[Z] for quick action

[X] for menu (action, items, build)

Pico8 BBS Page
